name: Kettlebell Clean to Squat — Best Beginner Exercise
description: @Asgooch's pick for the best beginner kettlebell exercise. The clean to squat teaches power, control, and coordination while challenging strength and core stability. Single exercise technique breakdown.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Clean to Squat
exercises.description: Start with KB on floor between feet. Explosively pull to rack position at shoulder. From rack, squat to full depth. Drive back up to standing. Switch sides after reps.
exercises.notes: Moderate weight; explosive hip drive for clean, upright torso in squat, brace core throughout.

raw.caption: The best beginner kettlebell exercise. The clean to squat is one of my go to's for beginners. It teaches power, control, and coordination while challenging strength and core stability.
textOverlays: One of the best beginner kettlebell moves to build strength and conditioning
raw.visualSummary: A shirtless man demonstrates the single-arm kettlebell clean to squat from multiple angles over 8 seconds.

uncertainties: Reps estimated as 8/side — not specified in video
